image.alt: DeFelice Orthodontics team smiling and welcoming patients

paragraphs.text: DeFelice Orthodontics is a progressive, friendly orthodontic practice serving Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek, NJ. Dr. Gregory J. DeFelice and our team provide comprehensive care for children, teens, and adults with treatment plans tailored to each patient.
We offer modern options like Damon® Smile braces and Spark™ clear aligners, combined with a compassionate, family-focused approach and convenient scheduling across multiple locations.

items.title: Comprehensive Care

image.alt: Orthodontic team consulting with patient

items.text: Personalized treatment plans for children, adolescents, and adults to meet each patient’s lifestyle and goals.

image.alt: Spark clear aligners

image.alt: Friendly orthodontic staff ready to help

items.text: Our highly trained clinical team focuses on comfort and clear communication so every visit is stress-free.

image.alt: Multiple DeFelice Orthodontics office locations

items.text: We serve several communities with offices in Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek for easier access to care.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Gregory J. DeFelice leads our practice with a patient-first approach. He and our team combine modern orthodontic techniques with a warm, family-oriented atmosphere to create confident, healthy smiles for patients of all ages.

image.alt: Dr. Gregory J. DeFelice, orthodontist at DeFelice Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We offer Damon® Smile braces, Spark™ clear aligners, and comprehensive orthodontic care, plus adjunctive technologies to support efficient, comfortable treatment for patients of all ages.

og_meta.title: Home - DeFelice Orthodontics
og_meta.description: DeFelice Orthodontics provides personalized orthodontic care in Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek, NJ.

image.alt: DeFelice Orthodontics team and office

paragraphs.text: Our mission is to provide compassionate, high-quality orthodontic care that improves smiles and builds confidence for patients of all ages.
We emphasize individualized treatment plans, the latest orthodontic technologies, and a friendly, comfortable patient experience tailored to each person’s needs and lifestyle.
From Damon® braces to Spark™ clear aligners and accelerated treatment options, we offer modern solutions to fit the way you live.
At our Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek offices, we combine skilled clinical care with a warm team approach so patients feel supported from their first visit through smile completion.

image.alt: DeFelice Orthodontics treatment room

paragraphs.text: Dr. Gregory J. DeFelice leads DeFelice Orthodontics and provides comprehensive care for children, teens, and adults across our Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek locations. He and the team focus on individualized treatment and modern orthodontic techniques to deliver consistent, patient-centered results.
Dr. DeFelice and our staff prioritize comfort, clear communication, and treatment plans that fit each patient's lifestyle.

image.alt: Treatment room at DeFelice Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We offer a range of options, including Damon® braces, Spark™ clear aligners, and complementary technologies that may help speed treatment when appropriate. Our philosophy centers on creating efficient, comfortable plans that achieve healthy, confident smiles.

image.alt: Close-up of orthodontic equipment

paragraphs.text: We serve families at three South Jersey offices: Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek. For location details and hours visit the location pages on our site.
Cape May Court House — https://www.dvbraces.com/cape-may-court-house-location
Hammonton — https://www.dvbraces.com/hammonton-location
West Creek — https://www.dvbraces.com/west-creek-location

image.alt: Front desk and reception at DeFelice Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: DeFelice Orthodontics is proud to support our South Jersey community. We participate in local school screenings, sponsor community events when possible, and work to make orthodontic care accessible and welcoming to families across Cape May County.

image.alt: Smiling patient sharing time together
Request an appointment at DeFelice Orthodontics

og_meta.title: About Us | DeFelice Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about DeFelice Orthodontics in Cape May County, serving Cape May Court House, Hammonton, and West Creek with modern orthodontic care for all ages.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Your first visit at DeFelice Orthodontics begins with a warm welcome. We review your dental and medical history, take any needed digital X-rays, and perform a careful orthodontic exam so we can explain the treatment options that make the most sense for you.

During this visit we’ll discuss timelines, estimated costs, and payment options, and answer any questions about braces or clear aligners. You can request an appointment online or choose the office location that’s most convenient for you.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and will file claims electronically to help you get the maximum benefits available. Our team is here to answer questions and verify coverage before treatment begins.
Flexible payment plans and third-party financing are available to make care affordable. Speak with our treatment coordinator to review options and create a payment plan that fits your budget.

image.alt: Request an appointment at DeFelice Orthodontics

seo.page_description: Start your smile journey with DeFelice Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit, access forms, and request an appointment online.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, new patient, forms, appointment, DeFelice Orthodontics

og_meta.title: Get Started | DeFelice Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your smile journey with DeFelice Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit, access forms, and request an appointment online.

image.alt: Smiling patients in a modern orthodontic office

paragraphs.text: DeFelice Orthodontics is a progressive, friendly practice committed to comprehensive care for children and teens. Early visits let us spot developing issues and, when appropriate, start gentle treatments that guide jaw growth and make future care simpler.

Starting treatment at the right time can reduce the need for more invasive procedures later. We evaluate growth patterns and bite development, and recommend simple, targeted steps when they will make the biggest long-term difference.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic intervention
Smiling family enjoying time together

paragraphs.text: Spark™ clear aligners are ideal for adult patients who want to enhance their smile while keeping treatment discreet. These removable aligners let you eat, brush, and floss normally while progressing toward a confident smile.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Damon® Smile braces offer an efficient, low-friction system that helps many patients reach treatment goals with fewer adjustments. They are an excellent choice for teens and adults who want a proven bracket option.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Spark™ aligners use precise digital planning to move teeth predictably. They are comfortable, clear, and designed for adults who want an effective, low-profile option.
Your treatment plan is personalized, and we monitor progress closely so adjustments happen only when needed, keeping visits efficient and focused.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: For complex jaw discrepancies, we coordinate surgical and orthodontic care with experienced oral and maxillofacial surgeons. This collaborative approach aligns bite, improves function, and enhances facial balance.
When surgery is recommended, we guide you through each step: pre-surgical orthodontics, the operation, and post-surgical finishing to ensure stable, long-term results.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient receiving orthognathic surgical consultation

paragraphs.text: After active treatment, custom retainers protect your investment. We offer removable and fixed options and will recommend a wear schedule that fits your lifestyle and long-term goals.
Regular check-ins help us confirm fit and retention. If a retainer is lost or worn, we’ll quickly restore stability so your smile stays where it belongs.

image.alt: Young woman smiling and holding an orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: We use modern digital tools and proven clinical techniques to make treatment more comfortable, precise, and predictable. Digital planning, clear aligner workflows, and efficient bracket systems help us tailor care to each patient.
Digital scans and computer-guided planning let us design efficient aligner sequences so you see progress from the start.

image.alt: Digital scanner in use during orthodontic consultation

paragraphs.text: Low-friction bracket systems can reduce treatment time and improve comfort for many patients.

image.alt: Orthodontic technology and digital imaging

paragraphs.text: We can combine clinically supported adjuncts, such as in-office or at-home acceleration technologies, when appropriate to help treatment move efficiently.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation
Modern orthodontic office interior with advanced technology
Request an appointment at DeFelice Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about treatment options, scheduling, and payment at DeFelice Orthodontics. The Smile Engineers are here to help.

accordion.header: What orthodontic options do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer a variety of treatment options tailored to each patient. Our practice provides Damon Smile braces and Spark clear aligners, among other solutions. Learn more about Damon Smile at https://www.dvbraces.com/damon-smile-info and Spark aligners at https://www.dvbraces.com/spark-clear-aligners.

image.alt: Orthodontic treatment discussion between doctor and patient in a bright treatment room

accordion.header: How do I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Requesting an appointment is simple. Use our online form at https://www.dvbraces.com/appointment-request or call the office. We will work with your schedule to find a convenient time for a consultation.

image.alt: Reception desk with smiling staff ready to schedule appointments

paragraphs.text: We see patients at multiple convenient locations. Visit our location pages to find the office nearest you: Cape May Court House (https://www.dvbraces.com/cape-may-court-house-location), Hammonton (https://www.dvbraces.com/hammonton-location), and West Creek (https://www.dvbraces.com/west-creek-location).

image.alt: Exterior of a modern orthodontic office with clear signage

paragraphs.text: At the orthodontic office of Dr. DeFelice, your smile is our top priority. Our highly skilled team and our use of modern treatments and technologies give you confidence that you are receiving a high standard of care tailored to your needs.

image.alt: Smiling orthodontic team standing together in a welcoming office

paragraphs.text: If you have more questions, visit our testimonials page at https://www.dvbraces.com/testimonials, use the chat widget on the site to ask a team member, or request an appointment at https://www.dvbraces.com/appointment-request and we will be happy to help.

image.alt: Patient speaking with a staff member at a reception desk
